item.title: Fundamentals of Data Visualization
item.description:
Read the book for free here: https://clauswilke.com/dataviz

Purchase the book on Amazon here: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1492031089

Look at the book source here: https://github.com/clauswilke/dataviz

item.title: Virtual Books
item.description: Many of my blog posts can be considered sections in books that I might have written but probably never would have. So, I’ve assembled some of these books as they get written.
